Actions.Name: Extract PDF pages by barcode
Actions.Description: Extract PDF files based on barcode matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

Actions.Name: Extract PDF pages by text
Actions.Description: Extract PDF files based on text matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

Actions.Name: Get barcode value
Actions.Description: Get Barcode From PDF. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

Actions.Name: Get data from PDF
Actions.Description: This action will extract important data from PDF files in the form of Key/Value pairs.

Actions.Name: Get PDF properties
Actions.Description: Gets the information about a PDF file

Actions.Name: Get text from PDF
Actions.Description: Get Text From PDF files based on the text location and regular expressions. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

Actions.Name: OCR PDF or images
Actions.Description: Generate searchable PDF from an image PDF or scanned images. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for more information.

Actions.Name: Split PDF by barcode
Actions.Description: Splits PDF files based on barcode matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation. In addition the Aquaforest Zonal Extraction Tool is available at [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html].

Actions.Name: Split PDF by page
Actions.Description: Splits PDF files based on split options defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation.

Actions.Name: Split PDF by text match
Actions.Description: Splits PDF files based on text matches defined by the user. Visit [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/aquaforest-flow-doc.asp] for documentation. In addition the Aquaforest Zonal Extraction Tool is available at [https://www.aquaforest.com/en/zone/get-pdf-zone.html].
